title: The End of the rainbow = Das Lockende ziel
creator_credit: Richard Tauber Tonfilm-Prod. GmbH, British Empire Films and Max Reichmann
brief_description: A Bavarian love story featuring world renowned tenor Richard Tauber in the lead role with Sophie Pagay, Lucie Englisch, Oscar Sima, Karl Elzer, Marie Elsmer. Written by Walter Forster and Paul Horbiger. In German with occasional English captions.
